subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The only thing Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur clarified when they played to a 2-2 tie was that a three-way race for a pair of Champions League berths is going to go to the wire.
snippet: The only thing Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur clarified when they played to a 2-2 tie was that a three-way race for a pair of Champions League berths is going to go to the wire.
